page.title: 11GAMES WHICH CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: {GAMES CHILDREN PLAY. We completed a survey of the many games that children in our area enjoy the most.The three favourite games{at {home}are computers,Boardgames like Monopoly and card games.With computers you can make up programmes,work out business and maths problems and buy games tapes.Our favourite {outdoor games are Bikes,Football and Roller Skating.The Bike is best because it is useful for getting about.You can also race Bikes and do tricks on them.Our favourite games{at School}are football (boys) netball(girls) and running.{ Football is favourite in our school because we have a football pitch and we play well in the competitions.Two teams play against each other and try to kick or head the ball past the goalkeeper into the opponent's goal.
